tns:patch.author: cdolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_secondary_sectors CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_secondary_sectors AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, COALESCE(level.name, '#') AS name, asl.id0 AS amp_sector_id, SUM(a.sector_percentage) as percentage, COUNT(*) - COUNT(a.sector_percentage) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_activity_sector a JOIN ni_all_sectors_with_levels asl ON a.amp_sector_id = asl.amp_sector_id LEFT JOIN amp_sector level ON level.amp_sector_id = asl.id0 JOIN amp_classification_config acc ON acc.id = a.classification_config_id WHERE acc.name = 'Secondary' GROUP BY a.amp_activity_id, asl.id0, level.amp_sector_id;
